pr_title: [GEOS-9656] JSON-LD validation will not try to validate the entire template

timeline.message: [GEOS-9656] JSON-LD validation will not try to validate the entire template

timeline.bodyText: Ouch, this is really ugly. What is this, data directory? getDataDirectory then. Does it need to be public? I don't see anything else using it, is this a leftover?
timeline.author: aaime
